ai.summary: A short, easy 2.7 km loop along the Colchester Orbital Spoke (North), suitable for beginners and casual walkers.
ai.terrain_summary: Expect a mostly easy route with flat to gentle gradients. Surfaces are likely to include paved paths and park trails; exact footing may vary along the route.
ai.safety_notes: Carry water and wear sturdy footwear. Stay on designated paths, be mindful of pedestrians and road crossings, and check weather conditions before you go. The route is described with limited regional specifics, so plan using a map or GPS in unknown areas.
ai.best_seasons: Spring, summer and early autumn when daylight is longest; the route is accessible year-round but weather in winter can be challenging.
